boostspecific.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Include this file to mark some part of the code where the boost internal library is specificaly used. Typically when accessToMotherLib is used, the #include <boostspecific.h> will prevent the later modification of the file toward for example maal::t3d.




MatrixAbstractLayer library documentation
